tweak up the happiness of her home.
When the intruder @nally succeeds in
Cevsing the husband to divorce his
Wife, the woman goes to hia apart:
ments and, repelling his forced atten:
tons, shoots him, Then the husband
Weallzes the trickery that had been
played on him, and the family is once
More reunited,
